title: Whats Your Body Count + Interview with Pop Smoke's Mom Audrey Jackson and Eric Adams
itunes:title: Whats Your Body Count + Interview with Pop Smoke's Mom Audrey Jackson and Eric Adams
description:
Today on the show for Freaky Freaky Friday we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our male listeners care about their woman's past and how many bodies they had before them after Boosie's comments on Lori Harvey. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Senator Ted Cruz for leaving the country while his state is dealing with widespread power outages and frigid temperatures. And what is worse he blame his kids for his decision to leave. Lastly, for the anniversary of the devastating death of Pop Smoke we had his mother Audrey Jackson and Brooklyn President Eric Adams call in where they spoke about updates on Pop Smoke's killer, healing process and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
